hero.title: Mustapha Amine TBINI — Network & Systems Administrator and cybersecurity enthusiast
hero.description: I design secure network infrastructures, deploy SIEM solutions and build monitoring tools for SOC operations.
hero.status: Open to collaboration and job opportunities

quote.text: Security is a continuous process — not a checkbox
quote.author: Docteur Who

about.title: about
description: Graduate in Computer Networks and IT Services (ISET Radès), currently pursuing an Engineering Degree in Computer Systems and Network Security (SSIR) at TEK-UP. Experienced in SIEM deployment and log analysis using the ELK Stack across multi-OS environments (Ubuntu, Rocky Linux, Windows). I focus on network infrastructure, Linux/Windows administration, and cybersecurity monitoring. Passionate about Blue Team practices, threat analysis, and automation to improve SOC detection and response. Always motivated to strengthen security and build resilient infrastructures.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m interested in collaborations and job opportunities — contact me via email or LinkedIn.

description: Network & Security engineer with practical experience in deploying ELK-based SIEMs and configuring network devices (Cisco/Huawei).
I am passionate about automating monitoring stacks, vulnerability intelligence and operational security (SOC).
